__TOC__

Now that there are Ubuntu packages, please see <nowiki>[[Novacut-GStreamer1.0|this GStreamer 1.0 guide]]</nowiki>.

Build gstreamer 0.11 and run from ~/gst:

 <pre>
mkdir ~/gst
cd ~/gst
mkdir git
cd git
git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gstreamer
cd gstreamer/
git checkout 0.11
./autogen.sh
make ERROR_CFLAGS=
cd ~/gst
ln -s git/gstreamer/scripts/gst-uninstalled gst-git
./gst-git
</pre>

Build gst-plugins-base:

 <pre>
cd ~/gst/git
git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugins-base
cd gst-plugins-base
git checkout 0.11
./autogen.sh
make
</pre>

Build gst-plugins-good:

 <pre>
cd ~/gst/git
git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugins-good
cd gst-plugins-good
git checkout 0.11
./autogen.sh
make
</pre>
